title: Today’s hot topics on Relevant Radio: Ukraine-gate, UN and religious freedom, Thomas Cooked, climate change, and more!
text:
Once again, I get to step outside the box and guest host the Drew Mariani Show on Relevant Radio® from 3-6 ET today! The Catholic talk-radio network is heard nationwide on the air, as well as online and through their free mobile app that plays live and podcast shows.

Today’s Relevant Radio® show includes:

Andrew C. McCarthy literally wrote the book on Ukrainian corruption in Ball of Collusion, and he’ll try to unwind what we know — and don’t know — about Ukraine-Gate today.

Wesley Smith on the lawsuit against a Catholic hospital for refusing to perform an elective hysterectomy

Kristan Hawkins on the 40 Days for Life kickoff and the attack in Rochester, MN

Brian Grim on Donald Trump’s historic address about religious freedom at the UN

How did a modern day fiscal story end a company that was almost two centuries old — and strand as many as half a million people? Juan Landa joins us to discuss the collapse of Thomas Cook and the UK’s big repatriation mission

And more to come … stay tuned!

We may add more before the show starts today, plus we will have the chaplet of Divine Mercy in the second hour. We will also take your calls at 1-888-914-9149. You can also listen on the Relevant Radio® app no matter where you are in the world, so download it now. I’ll look forward to talking with you!
